content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with Night Beat this week. From October 6, 1950, we’ll hear The Kenny Day Amnesia Case.

(30:02) The second episode comes from Unit 99. We’ll hear Attempted Suicide, from November 1, 1957.

Download CaseClosed704

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’re able to help, please visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
